verses.roman:
dui jane kṛṣṇa-kathā kahe rātri-dine
ei-mate goṅāila pāṅca-sāta dine

synonyms: dui jane—both the persons; kṛṣṇa-kathā—topics of Kṛṣṇa; kahe—speak; rātri-dine—day and night; ei-mate—in this way; goṅāila—passed; pāṅca-sāta—five to seven; dine—days.
translation: In this way they discussed topics about Lord Kṛṣṇa continually for five to seven days.
